== Who I am ==

I am currently working as a Kernel Engineer in the Ubuntu Kernel Team at Canonical. I am specialized in operating systems, embedded systems and cybersecurity. I have a master's degree in Computer Science and Engineering from Politecnico of Milan.

=== My Ubuntu story ===

Ubuntu user since Ubuntu 7.04 "Feisty Fawn". Back then I bought the book "Hacking: The art of exploitation" and it was bundled with an Ubuntu 7.04 LiveCD. Since then Ubuntu has been my distro of choice. 

=== My involvement ===

During my time at Canonical, I've worked in a variety of areas including: hardware enablement on both embedded systems and IBM mainframes (ppc64el and s390x architectures), CVE related patch submissions and reviews, maintainance of DKMS packages.
